title: I’m Weak to That Way of Talking!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>It’s the seaaa--!! Let’s go plaaay-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah! Ruby brought my floater and a beach ball. Which one do you want to do first, Ai-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Let’s see, it’s the sea after all, so how about we go swimming first?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>You’re right. Ruby will get the floater then!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah, before that. Ruby, have you put on sunscreen?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Umm, Ruby put some on before Ruby left the house, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>On a hot day like this, you need to reapply it every 2 hours or so, you know. And since you’re wearing a swimsuit, you have to cover your back as well. Ah, let me apply it for you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eeeeh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Your skin is so pretty, Ruby, so we have to protect it properly. Let me help you with that, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>P-, pigi! Ai-san, don’t talk so cool like that all of a sudden!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
